memories.content: Task: Replicating docs from /Users/zilliqa/Desktop/workhere/dev-portal/zq2 into /Users/zilliqa/Desktop/workhere/mintlify-docs. Current working directory is mintlify-docs repo. Need to analyze both source and target structures, then plan and execute systematic replication.

Source structure analysis: dev-portal/zq2 uses MkDocs with mkdocs.yaml config. Contains extensive API docs (admin, debug, eth, zilliqa), ecosystem docs (indexers, DeFi, NFT), nodes/validators, staking docs. Target mintlify-docs uses Mintlify format with docs.json, .mdx files, tab-based navigation. Need to convert from MkDocs .md format to Mintlify .mdx format.

Source content analysis complete: 321 markdown files across 51 directories. Content covers Zilliqa 2.0 blockchain dev portal with API docs, ecosystem, nodes/validators, staking. Source uses MkDocs format with YAML frontmatter, custom HTML divs, and MkDocs-specific styling. Target uses Mintlify .mdx with JSON config structure.

Conversion strategy: MkDocs→Mintlify requires: 1) .md→.mdx files, 2) Update frontmatter (id/title/keywords→title/description), 3) Convert MkDocs syntax (=== tabs) to Mintlify JSX components, 4) Handle internal links, 5) Create new docs.json config with tab-based navigation structure. Key differences: MkDocs uses standard markdown, Mintlify uses JSX components like AccordionGroup, Accordion, Tip.

Starting conversion of 5 key Zilliqa docs files from .md to .mdx Mintlify format:
1. changes.md → getting-started/changes.mdx
2. endpoints.md → getting-started/endpoints.mdx  
3. nodes/index.md → node-operations/nodes/index.mdx
4. staking/index.md → node-operations/staking/index.mdx
5. api/apis/index.md → apis/index.mdx

Key tasks: Update frontmatter, remove MkDocs syntax, convert to MDX, fix internal links

Successfully converted all 5 Zilliqa documentation files from .md to .mdx Mintlify format:

1. ✅ changes.md → /Users/zilliqa/Desktop/workhere/mintlify-docs/getting-started/changes.mdx
2. ✅ endpoints.md → /Users/zilliqa/Desktop/workhere/mintlify-docs/getting-started/endpoints.mdx
3. ✅ nodes/index.md → /Users/zilliqa/Desktop/workhere/mintlify-docs/node-operations/nodes/index.mdx
4. ✅ staking/index.md → /Users/zilliqa/Desktop/workhere/mintlify-docs/node-operations/staking/index.mdx
5. ✅ api/apis/index.md → /Users/zilliqa/Desktop/workhere/mintlify-docs/apis/index.mdx

Key conversions made:
- Updated frontmatter to Mintlify format (title/description)
- Converted interactive elements to Mintlify components (Cards, Notes)
- Fixed internal links to match new structure
- Removed MkDocs-specific syntax
- Added proper formatting for tables and status indicators

Task: Copy and convert 8 key API documentation files from dev-portal to mintlify-docs, converting .md to .mdx format and updating MkDocs syntax to Mintlify format. Files organized into 3 categories: ETH APIs (3 files), Admin APIs (2 files), Zilliqa APIs (3 files).

Documentation replication complete: Created comprehensive directory structure and converted key files from MkDocs to Mintlify format. Successfully copied getting-started (index, changes, endpoints), node-operations (nodes setup, checkpoints, staking), apis (sample files), ecosystem (tools, thegraph), and support sections. All files converted from .md to .mdx with proper frontmatter and Mintlify components. Now need to update docs.json configuration.

Restructuring navigation strategy: Convert to sidebar-based navigation with only APIs and Support as top tabs. Main content (Getting Started, Node Operations, Ecosystem, Tools) should be in sidebar for better UX. Need to update docs.json and fix internal links across all files.

Starting comprehensive internal link review and fix task for MDX files across directories: getting-started/, node-operations/, apis/, ecosystem/, tools-and-sdks/, support/. Need to fix common patterns like /zilliqa2/ links, ../endpoints.md, ../api/apis/, nodes sections, staking links, and remove .md extensions from internal links.

Found internal link issues in getting-started/index.mdx: 
1. /zilliqa2/changes should be /getting-started/changes
2. /zilliqa2/endpoints should be /getting-started/endpoints  
3. /zilliqa2/nodes should be /node-operations/nodes
4. /zilliqa2/sdk should be /tools-and-sdks
5. /zilliqa2/api/apis should be /apis

All these need to be updated to match the new directory structure.

Fixed link in node-operations/nodes/checkpoints/index.mdx: Changed /apis/api-endpoints#block-explorer to /getting-started/endpoints#block-explorers to match the correct location of block explorers section.

Completed comprehensive internal link review and fixes across all MDX files. Fixed 8 broken internal links in total:

GETTING-STARTED FIXES (5 links in index.mdx):
- /zilliqa2/changes → /getting-started/changes
- /zilliqa2/endpoints → /getting-started/endpoints  
- /zilliqa2/nodes → /node-operations/nodes
- /zilliqa2/sdk → /tools-and-sdks
- /zilliqa2/api/apis → /apis

NODE-OPERATIONS FIXES (3 links across 2 files):
- checkpoints/index.mdx: /apis/api-endpoints#block-explorer → /getting-started/endpoints#block-explorers
- staking/index.mdx: delegatedstaking → /node-operations/staking/delegated-staking (2 occurrences)

All other directories (apis/, ecosystem/, tools-and-sdks/, support/) had correct links. External GitHub .md links were left unchanged as they are correct.
Analyzing docs.json for navigation validation. Found main navigation with 6 groups and tabs navigation with APIs and Support tabs. Need to validate each page path corresponds to existing .mdx files.

Navigation validation complete for mintlify-docs. Checked all 18 navigation paths from docs.json:

MAIN NAVIGATION (13 paths) - All exist ✅:
- getting-started/index
- getting-started/changes  
- getting-started/endpoints
- node-operations/nodes/index
- node-operations/nodes/node
- node-operations/nodes/passive-pruning
- node-operations/nodes/checkpoints/index
- node-operations/nodes/checkpoints/download
- node-operations/staking/index
- node-operations/staking/delegated-staking
- tools-and-sdks/index
- ecosystem/index
- ecosystem/thegraph

APIS TAB (4 paths) - All exist ✅:
- apis/index
- apis/eth/eth_blockNumber
- apis/admin/admin_getPeers
- apis/zilliqa/GetBalance

SUPPORT TAB (1 path) - Exists ✅:
- support/index

All .mdx files exist and are properly structured with frontmatter.

Navigation restructuring complete: Successfully converted to sidebar-based navigation with only APIs and Support as top tabs. All 18 navigation paths validated successfully. Internal links fixed across 3 files (8 total fixes). Directory structure optimized by removing legacy template files. Final structure: 22 directories, 23 MDX files with clean organization and proper Mintlify format.
Starting validation of docs.json navigation structure. Found 21 total .mdx files in the project. Need to verify each path reference in docs.json exists as a corresponding .mdx file.

Validation complete. Found 18 navigation entries in docs.json, all corresponding .mdx files exist. 4 additional .mdx files exist but are not referenced in navigation. Tab structure follows Mintlify conventions with proper group organization. Anchors redirect from getting-started/index to root path.

Navigation fix complete: Successfully restructured to 3-tab layout - Docs (13 pages), APIs (4 pages), Support (1 page). All 18 navigation paths validated successfully. Found 4 additional API files not in navigation but available for future expansion. Navigation now properly exposes all main documentation sections via top-level Docs tab while keeping APIs and Support separate.
